channel.title: Kindergarten - Alive in Jesus
channel.description: The Kindergarten student guide is written with young children in mind. Parents will find engaging Bible stories, family discussion questions, activities, prayer prompts, and special Sabbath stories.
channel.itunes:summary: The Kindergarten student guide is written with young children in mind. Parents will find engaging Bible stories, family discussion questions, activities, prayer prompts, and special Sabbath stories.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2026 General Conference of Seventh-day Adventists
channel.itunes:author: Sabbath School & PM

item.title: Lesson 9 – The Tall Tower (February 22-28)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 9 – The Tall Tower (February 22-28)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Kindergarten, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 9
BIG IDEA: God is loving. He is never proud.
This week’s lesson is based on Genesis 11:1-9 and Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 117-124.
Visit our website https://aliveinjesus.info

item.title: Lesson 3 – The Sabbath (January 11-17)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 3 – The Sabbath (January 11-17)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Kindergarten, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 3
BIG IDEA: God is loving. He gave us the Sabbath.
This week’s lesson is based on Genesis 2:1-3; Exodus 20:8-10; and Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 47, 48.

item.title: Lesson 2 – Life in God’s Garden (January 4-10)

Kindergarten, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 2
BIG IDEA: God is loving. He created me.

item.title: Lesson 1 – A Brand-new World (December 28-January 3)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 1 – A Brand-new World (December 28-January 3)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Kindergarten, Year A, Quarter 1, lesson 1
BIG IDEA: God is loving. He created our world.
This week’s lesson is based on Genesis 1 and Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 44-51.
